text:
December 28, 1895.
THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL.
THE BEST PAYING INVESTMENT
FOR WOOD-WORKERS.
ERITH'S
DRYING KILNS.
No Experiment. Used all over the World.
Adopted by the London and North-Western Railway.
CHARLES ERITH & Co., DRYING ENGINEERS,
70, GRACECHURCH ST., LONDON.

IMPORTS.
Where no name is appended to the Imports below it is understood that the consignments are to "Order."
